title: I still have an original Pixel and it keeps freezing and the call function doesn't work. Help?
content:
My phone has not worked well over the past 4-5 months. I'm no longer able to make phone calls and the phone itself will crash intermittently. I've tried to narrow it down to any app that might be causing the problem and I've also gone through all the troubleshooting that Google has suggested. Everything else on the phone seems to work well (when it doesn't randomly crash or turn off).
Anyone have the same issue or know of a fix? I used to love this phone...
